translation.en: So, we took a look at your CT scans.  Mm- hmm.
translation.ja: CTスキャンを見たところ―

translation.en: And we do see a large mass in your stomach
translation.ja: 腹部に大きな影があります

translation.en: as well as several lesions on your liver.
At this point, I recommend that you see a specialist,
translation.ja: 専門医に行くことを お勧めします

translation.en: and I can help you with a recommendation and get you a list of people.
translation.ja: 専門医に行くことを お勧めします 紹介しますので

translation.en: And then go from there.
What kind of specialist?
An oncologist.
- That's the cancer one? - Yes.
- So, you think it's bad? - We don't really know,
translation.ja: 悪い？ まだわかりません

translation.en: which is why I think it's important for you to see a specialist.
translation.ja: 専門医をお勧めします

translation.en: He'll do a biopsy, more tests and...
What do you think though? What do you think about it? You've seen it and all. What do you think?
translation.ja: あなたの経験上どう思う？

translation.en: - Do you know how bad it is? - At this point, I don't really know.
translation.ja: どのぐらい悪い？ 現時点では何とも

translation.en: But you can tell us something, right? Can you tell us something?
translation.ja: 何か言えるだろ？ 何がある？

translation.en: - Don't you have to say-- - It's okay.
- I don't think she-- - She doesn't--
translation.ja: いいんだ　知らないんだ

translation.en: I think... I think... How about... All right, listen. How about this? How about I'm gonna make a statement?
And if it's a true statement, you don't have to correct me.
translation.ja: 本当なら修正しないで

translation.en: And you don't have to say anything to me.
Okay? So is what Michael has...
incurable?
Dude, that's a question. You gotta... It has to be--
It has to be a statement. All right.
So, my statement is...
- what Michael has is incurable. - That's it.
Do you understand the game? 'Cause you're not saying anything.
I don't know if that's... I don't know...
if that's cause you understand what we...
Did you see All the President's Men?
Um, remind me of your relationship. How do you know each other?
- We're, uh... We're neighbors. - Yeah.
- Okay. - I live on top of him.
There's still shit in the bottom of this.
Yeah, there is.
It's gross. I'm not reaching in there.
I know. I'll get it.
And the ball's gonna be gross.
- Okay. Did you serve yesterday? - Yeah. Yeah, it's your serve.
translation.ja: 昨日サーブした？ ああ 君のサーブだ

translation.en: Hold on.
translation.ja: 君のサーブだ ドライブインシアター

translation.en: Hold on. Go.
So, uh...
that, uh, cancer thing.
- What happened with the specialist guy? - He was special.
translation.ja: 専門医はどうだった？ 専門だった

translation.en: All right. Come on, Michael.
Don't... Don't drop it!
I'll... tell you what happened at lunch today.
translation.ja: 今日 お昼の出来事

translation.en: Yeah, what's up?
I was at the diner next to my office.
translation.ja: ダイナーにいた オフィスの横の

translation.en: Yeah.
I had that booth by the window, and...
this guy floats by the window. Guy just floats by the window.
I mean, he floats. I mean, I just see... I can't see his bottom. Yeah.
His bottom ain't moving. You can tell he's not moving. You know...
He floated by the window.
- He was probably on a hover board. - Skateboard?
translation.ja: ホバーボードに乗ってたんだ スケボー？

translation.en: No, that... You know, those things those kids do. They put it on their feet--
Yeah, I know he was on a hover board but it just started me thinking.
translation.ja: 多分ね　でも考えさせられた

translation.en: Just saw a guy hover.
Can you imagine that? That would screw up your whole life.
So, he hovered? So what?
If you saw a guy hover, so what?
translation.ja: 浮く男が？ どうかした？

translation.en: Yeah, so a guy hovers.
So, life's normal for you right after that?
I don't have a problem with it.
So, all rules of reality, thousands of years of science,
translation.ja: 現実のルールや 何千年もの科学は― 無意味だと言うのか

translation.en: everything, now means nothing? It means nothing?
I'll be like, cool.
You wouldn't be cool. You wouldn't be cool if a guy...
Of course I would.
No, you wouldn't. If there was no rules.
translation.ja: いいや ルールがなければ

translation.en: You go to put your sneakers on, and they're pumpkins.
translation.ja: 靴を履いたらカボチャ

translation.en: You blow your nose, a nickel comes out.
translation.ja: 鼻をかんだらコインが出る

translation.en: You look in the mirror, your face is a...
Is a peg board.
- I'm fine with that. - Yeah.
I know you're bullshitting. Give me my thing.
My hands are airplanes so just don't look.
Yeah. Well, get on one of them
translation.ja: ああ 飛行機に乗って　逃避行しな

translation.en: and fly to fucking where guys don't hover.
translation.ja: 飛行機に乗って　逃避行しな

translation.en: Because that's where I live.
What are you doing? That's the death punch.
Master! No!
Master.
Your death punch is extremely powerful, huh?
Had I landed the punch,
translation.ja: パンチが命中してたら

translation.en: your fate would be sealed.
Three steps in any direction,
and your heart would explode.
And then you'd be dead.
Come, young Chien.
Let's go eat.
Okay.
There was, uh...
- There was five. I took three. - That's not okay.
One's a... One's dwarf one, so it evens out.
Sure hope to see you tomorrow night.
Yeah, Trivial Pursuit. I won the last two of those.
translation.ja: ボードゲームね 前回２回勝った

translation.en: Have a good night, Andy.
Hmm.  See you!
Good night, Michael.
Good night, Andy.
Good morning.
Thank you.
Sir, that's, uh...That's my pen.
Thank you.
Hi.
Andy?
- Hi. - Hi. How are you?
I'm okay. I'm okay.
- Yeah? - Yeah, sure.
Did you have a good weekend?
- My... My weekend? - Mm- hmm.
- Yeah, she did it. - Who?
translation.ja: 彼女言いやがった 誰？

translation.en: The new girl. She said, How are you?
translation.ja: 新入りの子 元気？と聞かれた

translation.en: Oh, God, small talk. How'd it go?
translation.ja: 社交辞令 どうだった？

translation.en: Horrible. It's horrible.
- Spin. - Damn it.
translation.ja: スピンボール クソッ

translation.en: Unfortunately, your white blood count is...
Uh- huh. And what are my options?
Well, there are a few options.
I see.
Good night, Michael.
Good night, Andy.
What have I done?
You fool! Now you've done it!
You death punched your own master!
translation.ja: マスターにデスパンチを！

translation.en: Wait? No.
I got it. I got it.
- We're a second- half team. - Yeah. Yeah.
I could give a...
a great...
half- time speech if I was a coach. I...
translation.ja: ハーフタイム スピーチをする

translation.en: I really have this best speech I've ever heard at half- time.
- What is it? - I'm working on it.
I think it's fatty pork.
It's not fatty pork. I...
- I made the shirt. I know it's not-- - You made it about two years ago.
translation.ja: 僕が作ったシャツ ２年前　覚えてる？

translation.en: - You still remember what it is? - It was a year and a half ago,
translation.ja: ２年前　覚えてる？ １年半前だ “ファティー” はTが２つ

translation.en: and if it was fatty pork, there'd be two T's.
translation.ja: １年半前だ “ファティー” はTが２つ

translation.en: There'd be another T right there.
It's a satay fork. Little fork. Little appetizer fork.
translation.ja: ソテーフォーク リトルフォーク 前菜用の

translation.en: No, it's not-- Nothing in the kitchen. Get out of the kitchen.
I'll give you that info, and that's it.
That's a good one. That was a year and a half...
Sort of think... I like that it bothers you.
translation.ja: 君を困らせるのは楽しい

translation.en: Did you eat my cashews? I have no cashews left.
I just got walnuts.
I could tell you. Want me to tell you?
I saw the oncologist and...
I saw a second oncologist. He, um...
Long story, but they, um...
You know, there's nothing they can do.
So...
it's...
It's that.
The dying part is...
Meh. It's meh.
The hospital, the tubes, the bloating. I don't want any part of that.
translation.ja: 病院で管に繋がれて 腫れてくのは嫌だ

translation.en: So, I'm thinking...
before...
before it gets bad...
I want to...
end it...
They got a whole process. If you get less than six months they give you this...
translation.ja: 余命６ヶ月以内だったら―

translation.en: these pills you can take.
And you can do it at home.
Sounds...
You know.
But I don't want to do it alone and...
translation.ja: でも１人でやりたくない

translation.en: I was hoping you would help me out.
Me?
Do... I mean...
The way...
You gotta... You can't give up. Huh? You gotta...
You can't do that. Miracles happen, right?
What about the guys who say, You got six months to live and...
next thing you know, he's climbing Mount Everest.
translation.ja: エベレスト登る人もいる

translation.en: Jim Abbott had one arm. Remember Jim Abbott on the Yankees? He had one arm.
translation.ja: ジム・アボットは 片腕がなかった

translation.en: He pitched a no- hitter.
translation.ja: 凄腕ピッチャーだった

translation.en: He didn't give up.
You don't give up, Michael.
They already gave me the prescription.
They can do that? They can just give you that...
medicine that kills you?
Yeah.
I don't want you to look at me like this.
But I was not gonna tell you 'cause I didn't want it to change things, you know?
translation.ja: 今まで通りでいたくて 言いたくなかった

translation.en: You know...
I want to make some pizzas.
I want to watch some movies.
I want to play some Paddleton.
You know?
Yeah?
Okay.
Should we play the second half?
Yeah, right? We gotta.
It's your serve.
Lay it out.
These are all pretty far away.
What's that?
The places where your doctor said we could fulfill the...
translation.ja: その処方箋の薬がある場所

translation.en: prescription. The closest one is...
almost six hours.
- Six hours? - Yeah.
A lot of pharmacies won't fill it 'cause of moral reasons.
translation.ja: 倫理問題で 扱わない薬局も多い

translation.en: All right, Guess we're gonna do a little road trip.
What does that mean? Road trip?
You don't just do a road trip, right?
translation.ja: 気軽にロードトリップ？

translation.en: What do you mean, what does that mean?
We'll drive there. We'll get the meds, we'll find a place...
translation.ja: ドライブして薬もらって 泊まって

translation.en: Your stove burnt the pizza up. It's burnt.
Fuck!
Come on!
It's ruined now. It's ruined.
- Hold on. - No, I'm not gonna.
We can't eat that. We gotta eat something else.
- It's not that bad. - What are we gonna eat?
translation.ja: 悪くない 他に何食べる？

translation.en: - Nice work. - Look at that piece of shit!
Ah, this is fucked!
You gonna eat that still?
It's gonna be good.
Grab a plate.
I'll try it.
All right.
How about the air in the tires?
Yeah, I put a bunch in. It's okay.
Not too much though, right?
There's no such thing as too much air.
translation.ja: 入れすぎって事はない

translation.en: Oh, yeah there is.
How about the Hindenberg?
That was helium.
Yeah, but it was too much.
Hey, I had some oatmeal so I'm gonna need a bathroom in two hours.
translation.ja: オート麦食べたから ２時間でトイレに行く

translation.en: But you also had a second coffee, so maybe 90 minutes?
translation.ja: コーヒー2杯飲んだから あと90分？

translation.en: I can still see.
- What do you see? - I see everything.
I see everything. Yeah, I do. There's a tree. There's a...
What's that?
A person or a chicken.
If you had to live like this...
You could adapt. That's the great thing about the human mind.
translation.ja: 慣れるのが　人間の脳の良さ

translation.en: This is how bees see.
How many wishes would a genie have to give you where...
translation.ja: 魔法のランプの 何個目の願いで―

translation.en: one of those wishes would be sand off?
What's sand off?
Whenever you said sand off...
every grain of sand that was on your body fell off.
Twelve hundred, maybe?
No, ten. If they gave me ten, I would do it.
You can only think of nine wishes before you get to sand off?
translation.ja: その前に９回しか 願いをしない？

translation.en: How many you need?
Okay, uh...
your first one.
All the cancer's gone.
Then a billion dollars, flying, whatever.
translation.ja: それから10億ドル 空を飛ぶ

translation.en: Invisible.
Invisible, and then sand off, yeah. Well, pajamas on.
translation.ja: その後サンドオフ パジャマオン

translation.en: Pajamas... It's late at night, you're tired. Pajamas on.
translation.ja: 疲れてる時 “パジャマオン”

translation.en: You got enough gas?
I think there's a buffer. I think we're okay.
translation.ja: それはバッファー　大丈夫

translation.en: Well, not that big a buffer.
What's the worst case scenario? We run out of gas.
What's the worst case scenario? We run out of gas here, right?
Next thing you know, we're drinking our urine.
translation.ja: 自分の尿飲む事になる

translation.en: How do you get from running out of gas, the next step is drinking urine?
translation.ja: ガス欠で いきなり尿を飲む？

translation.en: You can hitchhike. You can...
We'll call somebody. We'll walk to the gas station.
translation.ja: 電話もできる スタンドに歩いて行ける

translation.en: - There's nobody out here. - You go right to drinking urine.
translation.ja: 誰もいない いきなり尿飲むなんて

translation.en: It's like Twilight Zone out here.
translation.ja: まるでトワイライトゾーン

translation.en: How's that half- time speech coming, by the way?
translation.ja: ハーフタイムスピーチの 練習の調子は？

translation.en: It's good.
Oh, yeah?
I could sell it. But if I told it to a coach,
they'd want to buy it from me.
Hey, guys, gather around.
That's how it starts. Yeah.
- That's more like it - That's the beginning.
translation.ja: それだけ？ まだ冒頭

translation.en: That's it.
- Who is that? What's that? - It's my sister.
She knows, right?
She knows about the cancer, but not about the other stuff.
translation.ja: がんの事は知ってる それ以外は知らない

translation.en: I kind of want to keep that to myself.
Oh.
What about me?
No, that's...
That's different. That's, you know...
Yeah.
- You know? - Yeah.
Yeah.
I get it.
She does small talk, your sister?
The queen.
Yeah.
Ooh. Ostrich farm. Three miles.
- Uh, yeah. - We're doing that.
Eh... You want to?
- I've never seen an ostrich. - I've seen them.
translation.ja: ダチョウ見た事ない 僕はある

translation.en: - I've seen them on TV. - Yeah, but in person, though.
translation.ja: テレビで でも実物はない

translation.en: They're kind of nasty, though.
- Really? - They'll run right at you.
Fastest land animal, actually.
- I don't think it is. - Yeah.
Yes, it is. Forty miles an hour.
translation.ja: そうさ　時速40マイル

translation.en: The cheetah goes...
Yeah. That's four legs.
Per leg...
they're the fastest.
Okay, I think we're getting close.
Looks like a tourist town or something.
A lot of windmills in this town.
You're walking really fast, Andy.
I'm not nervous.
We talk to the guy, Phil, and we got a plan, right? Okay.
translation.ja: フィルって奴に会う 予定だろ？

translation.en: This sinus infection is so awful.
- I know. - And I feel like I...
I feel like this medication I've taken before and it hasn't worked.
translation.ja: この薬は効かなかった

translation.en: - Give it a try, okay? - Okay.
- Have a good rest of the day. - Thank you.
All right. Bye, bye, Judy.
Hi, guys. What can I do for you?
Hi, there. We're here to see Phil.
Phil's not in today. I'm Dave. I'm standing in for Phil.
translation.ja: 今日は休みだ 僕はデイブ

translation.en: We talked to Phil though. You spoke to Phil.
translation.ja: フィルと電話で話した

translation.en: Yeah, we, uh... But...
- Okay. So we should come back. - But I can help you guys.
translation.ja: また来るよ 僕でよければ

translation.en: Yeah, but this is something...
- This is kind of top secret. - I spoke to Phil. It's a...
translation.ja: 秘密なんだ 特殊な薬なんだ

translation.en: He was gonna... It's a special medication he was gonna...
- Are you Michael Thompson? - I'm Michael. Yeah.
translation.ja: マイケル・トムソンさん？ そうだ

translation.en: You want to call Phil maybe?
It's okay. I can handle it. Yeah.
Michael Thompson.
I don't like that. We should come back for Phil. Let's come back.
translation.ja: またフィルがいる時来よう

translation.en: Why are you so obsessed with Phil?
What if he puts something wrong in there. Could be dangerous.
Give me one second. I'll get you guys dialed in here.
translation.ja: ちょっとお待ちくださいね

translation.en: All right. How are you guys doing today?
Okay.
- There are three medicines involved. - We know all this part.
translation.ja: 薬は３つ 知ってるよ

translation.en: This is what we did with Phil. That's why...
Phil told us.
If Phil was here he wouldn't say that to us 'cause we already spoke to him about it.
translation.ja: フィルからすでに聞いてる

translation.en: I understand, but Phil told me I had to read these instructions.
translation.ja: 説明するよう フィルから言われてます

translation.en: It's protocol.
- Okay, go ahead. - Thank you.
Okay, so you'll be taking two of these one hour before taking the drink.
This one is for anxiety.
This one is for nausea. It'll keep you from vomiting.
And this one ran all the way home.
- The little piggies. - Yeah.
Um, and in the event of vomiting after ingesting the drink,
the patient should have a family member contact
translation.ja: 家族から医者に 連絡するように

translation.en: their referring physician to determine a course of action.
translation.ja: 家族から医者に 連絡するように 次のプランを考えます

translation.en: This big one...
is the medicine you'll be taking last.
There are 100 pills in this bottle,
which is the lethal dose.
Can you ring it up now?
Whoa, whoa, whoa, hold on.
- You're not paying for this. - Oh, no. Yeah.
I didn't tell you about this, but here, take the card.
translation.ja: 言ってなかったが カード払いで

translation.en: - Take the card and ring it up. - Andy, it's $3,500.
translation.ja: 言ってなかったが カード払いで 3500ドルだ

translation.en: I know what it is. I have more money than you.
translation.ja: 知ってる　君より稼いでる

translation.en: - I want to do this. - It's a lot.
translation.ja: 払いたい 高額すぎる

translation.en: I want to do it.
Let me do it.
Thank you.
- - I'm sorry, sir. Your card was declined.
It's not declined. You gotta put it through.
- You gotta run it through. - Nice one.
- Okay. - Can you run it through again?
My mistake. I'll give it another shot.
translation.ja: すみません 試してみます

translation.en: You know that those things glitch a lot.
- Sorry, declined again. - Give me the card.
translation.ja: ダメです カードを

translation.en: - Give me the card. - I'll pay for it.
I'm just gonna call the bank up, that's all.
- I can pay for it and you pay me back. - Give me your phone.
translation.ja: 後で返す 携帯貸して

translation.en: Give me your phone. Don't ring anything up,
'cause this'll take one second. I'm gonna call the number right there.
translation.ja: この番号にかければ すぐ終わる

translation.en: I see the number right there. Give me one second. Don't ring anything up.
translation.ja: この番号にかければ すぐ終わる 待ってくれ

translation.en: You will have to empty the contents
of all 100 pills into a glass
- and mix them with half a cup of water. - It's Andy Freedman.
translation.ja: 水と混ぜる アンディー・フリードマンだ

translation.en: The drink will be a little bitter, but you want to drink it all at once.
translation.ja: 苦いですが 一気に飲んで下さい

translation.en: It's me, though. What do you want me to tell you?
I am out of town.
If the patient decides they don't...
You don't...
want to end their life after ingesting
- the medication... - Okay.
...they must contact emergency medical services
translation.ja: すぐに救急車を呼んで

translation.en: - to begin lifesaving measures. - I'm not yelling.
translation.ja: 救命して下さい 叫んでない

translation.en: - I'll stop yelling, but I'm not yelling. - Yeah.
Well, send it then. They're gonna send a code.
I don't have a phone.
That's why you're supposed to have a phone.
I have e- mail. Can I see my e- mail on your e- mail?
translation.ja: メールはある そのパソコンから見れる？

translation.en: Uh, Phil has his log- in codes. I don't have it.
translation.ja: フィルが パスワードを知ってる

translation.en: See? Why don't we wait for Phil? Let's just wait for Phil to come back, - And none of this happens. - It's gonna be fine
translation.ja: フィルを待ってれば こんな事になってない

translation.en: Hold on. I sent you my pet name about five years ago.
translation.ja: ５年前ペットの名前を 送ったぞ

translation.en: Is that it? Are we done?
Yes, yes. Uh, yeah, I read it all.
- Let me just pay for it. I got it. - Yeah. Why...
- Where does it go? - He's okay?  Where does my pet name go?
translation.ja: ペットの名前はどこへ？

translation.en: No!
What are you doing?
What do you mean? I'm taking a pain pill.
I don't know. I just...
I thought it was...
Velkommen.
Can I help you?
Hi, we have a reservation for...
- Freedman. - Okay.
I have it right here.
- No, I got it. - Printed it out.
translation.ja: 大丈夫です 印刷した

translation.en: Here you are.
You're all set. I just need a credit card for incidentals...
translation.ja: 保証の為 クレジットカードを…

translation.en: Okay. I'm gonna give you a credit card, but if you could wait until the end to
translation.ja: 今カードを渡しますが 銀行に電話するまで 待って下さい

translation.en: do whatever you have to do with it. I'll call the bank,
translation.ja: 銀行に電話するまで 待って下さい

translation.en: - and it's all gonna be fine. - Let me just...
translation.ja: 銀行に電話するまで 待って下さい 僕が出すよ

translation.en: I'll get this one.
Okay, you get it. Put it on his card, but I'm paying for it.
It's all going down.
- I'm gonna pay it all back, okay? - That's fine.
- It's 79 a night, yes? - It is.
Every penny.
All... I'm keeping...
- Okay. - All right, thanks.
So, guys, I got you, um...
two queens.
- Um... - Right.
We have another room with a king.
translation.ja: キングの部屋もあります

translation.en: We don't want two rooms.
I'm sorry. Not two rooms. Would you prefer to have a king?
translation.ja: キングベッドご希望ですか？

translation.en: If you feel more comfortable, we're fine with that.
The queens are good.
Guess I'll take that then, right?
The bag. I'll hold the bag.
Keep it in my house just so we know where it is.
I mean, I...
I just...
Just assumed, you know, I'd hold onto it.
translation.ja: 保管するんだと思ってた

translation.en: I got a safe place in my closet. Up behind the, uh...
translation.ja: クローゼットに 安全な場所がある

translation.en: the box. I have that...
The Rod Carew rookie card. I got that little...
I don't think anybody's gonna steal it.
Who knows? Sandy got broken into two times and she's on the ground floor.

translation.en: I was married once.
- Are you kidding me? - Uh- uh.
- You never told me that? - I never told anybody that.
translation.ja: 初耳だ 誰にも言ってない

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me?
How long?
- Year and a half. - Yeah?
I used to feel so bad about it.
I really...
I thought I wanted that...
that life. I really...
And I was...
I left her. It was awful.
And then I thought...
Oh, I know I need to be alone. I'm convinced. That's what I need to do. I need to be alone.
I thought that for sure.
And then I ended up here...
with you.
And I knew.
Like, This is my spot.
This is where I belong.
When you first came...
and you were looking at this apartment
- when Barry was showing it to you... - Yeah.
...I saw you.
Yeah, I didn't want you to get it.
translation.ja: 入居して欲しくなかった

translation.en: I know, you looked...
You look weird.
Yeah, I mean, I didn't know you were gonna be a cool guy and everything.
translation.ja: クールな奴とは知らなかった

you know, you see on the news. He's got a...
translation.ja: 君はニュースで見るような 奴だと言った

translation.en: He's got a freezer full of hands and feet.
I told Barry, I said, Eh, why don't you keep looking?
translation.ja: 他の人を探したらと言った

translation.en: Yeah.
It's all right.
I've seen people look at me like that in...
translation.ja: よくそういう目で 見られる

translation.en: a Rite Aid or something.
- People look at me like that all the time. - Yeah.
translation.ja: 僕はいつも そんな目で見られる

translation.en: Oh, God. We gotta deal with this.
I mean, it's now or never, so...
I'll just tell you if you want.
I don't think you're gonna like it though.
- You never know. - I hope you do.
- It's fatty pork. - No, it's not fatty pork.
- It's fatty pork. - It's not fatty pork.
What is it?
It's nothing.
Wait.
Yeah, I did that.
There's no answer?
No, there's no answer,
- but I have a reason. - Two years?
- Why would you do that to me? - Because when we do puzzles...

translation.en: it's a lot of work and...
it's hard, but it's fun.
And there's a finish. There's something real you can finish.
I know, but you always look sad when we'd finish.
translation.ja: 終わると君は悲しそう

translation.en: - I don't look sad. No, I don't. - You always look a little sad.
You don't see it. I see it.
We're happy, we're done, we got it.
And then you get a little sad. I thought, You know what?
He'll never get it.
He'll never get this shirt.
translation.ja: このシャツは答えがない

translation.en: This will be his favorite shirt.
translation.ja: だから気に入ると思って

translation.en: - Got any other confessions? - No.
I thought you were a killer. I...
translation.ja: 君を殺人犯だと思った

translation.en: gave you a shirt with no answer.
translation.ja: 答えのないシャツをあげた

translation.en: That's it. I'm clean now.
Come on, that's the last one. We got to...
All right.
What's the next step?
Fill the glass with four ounces of water.
That's the lethal dose.
And you dilute it.
It's bitter, so you're gonna drink it all at once.
Okay.
And then...
in a few minutes,
- you fall asleep. - Yeah.
- And then a few minutes later... - I remember that part.

translation.en: Then there's, um...
The yellow one is for anti- vomiting.
translation.ja: 黄色いのは吐き気止め

translation.en: That's the thing. If you vomit this up then it's all for nothing.
translation.ja: これを吐いたら意味ない

translation.en: This is for anti- anxiety.

translation.en: If you take it and then...
I don't want that. I want to be in my head.

translation.en: - All right, I'll keep this. - I don't need that but I'll take this.
translation.ja: じゃあ預かる でもこれは飲む

translation.en: All right.
Takes an hour. After you take that pill...
I got to wait an hour after?
You got to wait an hour for that to take effect, yeah.
All right, we should have taken...
Let me go... Hold on. Hold on.
- Go ahead. - Tell me when you swallow it.
Okay.
Now, so we just wait an hour?
Hmm. You got to wait an hour.
Yeah, you should feel free to sell the car.
Yeah, maybe.
I don't think you should be driving, anyway.
I do think you should keep my phone though.
Nah.
- Nah, I don't want it. - What do you mean, nah?
Don't you think it's time you get a phone?
Yeah, I'll get one.
I don't want yours.
You don't get e- mail right? You can't get e- mail on it.

translation.en: Nothing wrong with my phone.
There's nothing wrong. I'll keep it. I just want a good one.

translation.en: You don't even know how to do e- mail on a phone.

translation.ja: 携帯でメールする方法も 知らないのか 説明書読むよ

translation.en: Yes.
- Yeah, don't do that. - What?
- What are you doing? - I'm smelling a tree.

translation.en: - I haven't smelled it before. - There's bugs.
translation.ja: 嗅いだ事ない 虫がいる

translation.en: What's it gonna do to me now?
I don't know. There's a lot of larvae and stuff on there.

I don't think you're gonna like...
What?
I don't believe...
but if there's an after...
situation...
and I could somehow contact you...
translation.ja: 君に何らかの方法で… 連絡できたら

translation.en: You know, like the woman in the hotel. She hangs out with her husband, you know.
translation.ja: あのホテルの女性と その夫みたいに

translation.en: She's saying what she feels. You don't mean real. I mean, that's...
translation.ja: それは彼女の気持ちだけ

translation.en: - That's just in movies and stuff, right? - But on the...
.001 chance...
translation.ja: 可能性が0.001でも… あれば

translation.en: would you want me to...
contact you?
This is...
This is a tough one for me.
translation.ja: 難しいな どうかな

translation.en: - I don't know. - I could send you a signal.
translation.ja: どうかな 信号を送る

translation.en: - Yeah. - You know?
Push the water glass a little bit or...
- leave you a note in the foggy mirror... - No. No, don't do that.

translation.en: No, no. Do not do that.
Nothing sudden or, you know...
Nothing at midnight.
Yeah.
No moaning through the vent. No, woo.
Although now...
What?
You know, you did now. Now I'm just gonna think anything weird...

translation.en: I'm gonna think it's you. The wind, it's you.
translation.ja: 風でも　君の仕業だと思う

translation.en: The light flickers, it's you.
Let's just pick something right now, so I know everything else...

I'm winded.
I just realized something.
I never talked about...
where.

I guess you could just...
- There's no instructions. - No.

All right. Okay.

translation.en: - For when... - If that's what you want.

I don't want to do it on the floor.
All right.
Okay.

Yeah, okay.

Okay. Yeah.
Okay. All right. Okay.

Yeah, you don't have to be scared. I think it's gonna be okay.
I think everything's gonna be okay.

Okay.
It's okay, man.

I'm okay.
Okay.
You're doing good.
Yeah, I know. 'Cause I know. I got a feeling.
I got a feeling, man. I got a feeling about this.
Give me your hand.
Oh, my God. I'm already-- Give me your hand. Hey.
I want to tell you I love you.
Okay?
Okay.
Okay.
- It's okay. - Okay.
I feel good.
I feel okay.
You're gonna be okay.
- You know? - Okay.
It's okay, Michael.
Hey...

I'm gonna close my eyes now, okay?
- Yeah? - Okay?
- Okay. - All right.

Uh, yeah. We're moving into C.

Thank you.

Okay.
